price: (Abagaragu ba Nyirimpuhwe kandi) ni na bo batajya baba abahamya b’ibinyoma, kandi iyo banyuze ku bidafite akamaro, babinyuraho biyubashye.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَشۡهَدُونَ ٱلزُّورَ وَإِذَا مَرُّواْ بِٱللَّغۡوِ مَرُّواْ كِرَامٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna lā yashhadūna al-zūra wa-idhā marrū bil-laghwi marrū kirāman
